member.name: T:Useful.UI.ViewModels.RelayCommand`1
member.summary: A command whose sole purpose is to relay its functionality to other objects by invoking delegates. The default return value for the CanExecute method is 'true'.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The execution logic.Delegate to execute when Execute is called on the command. This can be null to just hook up a CanExecute delegate.

member.summary: Occurs when changes occur that affect whether or not the command should execute.

member.name: M:Useful.UI.ViewModels.RelayCommand`1.CanExecute(System.Object)
member.summary: Defines the method that determines whether the command can execute in its current state.
member.param: Data used by the command. If the command does not require data to be passed, this object can be set to null.
member.returns: true if this command can be executed; otherwise, false.
